title: Butternut squash gratin
ingredients: ['50g butter', '1 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded and cut into 2cm cubes', '1 teaspoon brown sugar (optional)', '250ml chicken stock', '250g grated Gruyere cheese', '250g grated mature Cheddar cheese', '110g dried breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
